message.content:
cs.CV, cs.RO, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.GR 

The paper proposes a novel direct visual odometry formulation that combines a fully direct probabilistic model with consistent joint optimization of all model parameters, including geometry and camera motion. The paper focuses on computer vision and robotics, which suggests that it is likely to belong to the cs.CV and cs.RO sub-categories. The paper also mentions the use of a full photometric calibration and non-linear response functions, which suggests that it may also belong to the cs.LG and cs.AI sub-categories. Finally, the paper evaluates the proposed method on three different datasets, which suggests that it may also belong to the cs.GR sub-category.
